name: Homelette
description:
Homelette Description

A physic platformer where you are an egg trying to go back to the farm while you avoid to end up as an omelette.

Thanks for playing!

Made during ludum dare 46.

Controls

Gamepad recommended

-left joystick/WASD to roll
-right joystick/mouse to control camera
-A to Give Impulsion/left click (you can keep pressing to go farther)

Credits

-Justin nony
-Etienne Lagarde
